description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the Windows Hyper-V denial of service vulnerability (CVE-2024-20684):

1. Download and install the update package KB5034765 for your respective Windows build from the official Microsoft Update Catalog.
2. Restart your system after installation to implement the changes effectively.

**Details**:
This update mitigates the impact of the identified denial of service vulnerability affecting Hyper-V. The vulnerability's improper input validation could be exploited locally or remotely to disrupt service. Ensure to apply the update relevant to your specific Windows version.
- For manual installation, download the update package from:
  - Windows 11 Version 23H2: [KB5034765](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034765)
  - Windows 11 Version 22H2: [KB5034765](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034765)
  - Windows 11 Version 21H2: [KB5034766](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034766).

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure that your system version matches one of the supported builds:
  - Windows 11 Version 23H2 (10.0.22631.3155)
  - Windows 11 Version 22H2 (10.0.22621.3155)
  - Windows 11 Version 21H2 (10.0.22000.2777)
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the update installation.
